name: Bondage
description: A type of sexual gratification using the pleasure-pain principle, using ties and restraints

name: Domination
description: A person who exercises control, power and influence

name: Exhibitionist
description: The idea of doing sexual activities in public areas or infront of others

name: Masochist
description: Sexual gratification from being subjected to physical pain or humiliation

name: NonMonogamist
description: Having more than one partner, or having one partner but having sex with other people

name: Role Play
description: To act out a particular scene or fantasy

name: Sadist
description: Infliction of physical or psychologic suffering to stimulate excitement

name: Submission
description: Inclined to submit or yield to the authority of another

name: Vanilla
description: Noninvolvement of BDSM, kink or fetish activities

name: Voyeur
description: Interest in observing unsuspecting people while they undress, are naked, or engage in sexual activities.
